name: traefik-kop
description: traefik-kop is a self-hosted dashboard and helper for Traefik setups, providing quick overviews of routers, middlewares, and services, making complex reverse proxy configurations easier to manage.
features: Configuration overview: View all Traefik routers, services, and middleware in an organized dashboard.
Visual representation: Understand complex routing configurations through visual diagrams and layouts.
Quick navigation: Jump between related routers, services, and middleware for efficient troubleshooting.
Status monitoring: See which routes are active, healthy, or experiencing issues at a glance.
Search functionality: Find specific routers or services quickly using search and filtering.
Configuration details: View detailed configuration for each component including rules and settings.
Middleware chains: Visualize middleware chains and their order of execution for debugging.
Service health: Monitor backend service health and availability from the dashboard.
Real-time updates: See configuration changes reflected immediately as Traefik discovers new services.
Simplified management: Manage complex Traefik setups more easily with an intuitive interface.
Documentation links: Access relevant Traefik documentation directly from configuration views.
Export capabilities: Export configuration information for documentation or backup purposes.
